title: As Good As Anne Lister
description: Sylvia has loved Len/Lenora for years, but sheâ€™s so tired of waiting. Is it finally their time to break free of routines?Once a year Sylvia buys Len a pack of beer, and in return Len buys Sylvia a voucher. Love takes time, and so does Len. One year Sylvia decides to speed up the process. She goes rogue and chooses a romantic book.What will happen during the gift exchange this year? Is Len ready to make a decision which will change their lives forever? And the biggest question of all: Can Sylvia love Len as good as Anne Lister?
author: Eule Grey
